title: Current North Korea situation & Remote Viewing - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/17/17
itunes:title: Current North Korea situation & Remote Viewing - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/17/17
description:
George Noory and guest Major Ed Dames discuss his latest Remote Viewing info and his opinion of what will happen with the current Nuclear showdown with North Korea.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
